product information:
The ViewSonic VG930M is a stylish, slim, and sleek LCD TFT monitor that offers incredible multimedia performance to your desktop. The 19-inch LCD of this ViewSonic monitor flaunts a response time of 8ms, thereby letting you view your games at their best. With 300-nit brightness and a contrast ratio of 700:1, this LCD TFT monitor gives you crystal-clear imagery and breathtaking color. Built-in stereo speakers coupled with horizontal and vertical viewing angles of 160 and 155 degrees respectively, make this ViewSonic monitor the perfect mode of enjoying multi-media. Other features of this LCD TFT monitor are 1280x1024p resolution, an anti-glare surface, various ports for connectivity, and a 360-degree swivel range. Sized at 16.8 X 18.9 X 9.1 inches, the ViewSonic VG930M will take up no space and keep your surface-top uncluttered.
